name: BirdsIsle
description:
Solve ​match-3 levels ​ to make Birds Isle a better place for life. Earn coins as you complete ​match three puzzles​ and buy new birds, plants and decorations for your ornitary. Play and have fun using explosive combos and boosters!

Build your own ornitary, your own Birds Isle. As you improve the ornitary you get "happiness points". The better your place is, the happier your birds are! Receive extra bonuses when your happiness indicator fills up.


There are many amazing bird species living in tropical forests and they need your support.

Game features: - Hundreds of challenging ​match 3 levels​ . - Unique boosters & explosive combinations. - Amazing graphics, sensational gameplay! - Build, design and decorate your own ornitary. - A creative community: connect to your friends via Facebook, share and borrow ideas!

Birds Isle is a totally ​ free game​ to play. But when it’s tough you can get some extra diamonds: use in-app purchases to boost your powers.
